TextView.android:text:
Myself

Assistant's name can be asked by command which contains 'your name' phrase.

Example : 'whats your name'

Date

Date can be asked by command which contains 'date' word.

Example : 'show date'

Time

Time can be asked by command which contains 'time' word.

Example : 'show time'

Flashlight

Flashlight can be turned on/off by command which contains 'flash' word and 'on/off' word.'

Example : 'turn on flash/turn off flash'

Call

Calling can be done by command which contains 'call' word and call receiver's name.

Example : 'call rohan'

Message

Message can be sent by command contains 'message/text' word, receiver's name and message.

Example : 'send a text to mahesh hello'

WhatsApp Message

WhatsApp message can be sent by command contains 'whatsapp' word, message/text' word, receiver's name and message.

Example : 'send a whatsapp message to abhi how are you

Bluetooth

Bluetooth can be turned on/off by command which contains 'bluetooth' word and 'on/off' word.'

Example : 'turn on bluetooth/turn off bluetooth'

Wi-Fi

Wi-Fi can be turned on/off by command which contains 'wi-fi' word and 'on/off' word.'

Example : 'turn on wi-fi/turn off wi-fi'

Open Application

Application can be opened by command which contains 'open' word and application name.'

Example : 'open whatsapp'

Volume Modes

Volume modes can be changed by command which contains 'normal/silent/vibrate' word and 'mode' word.'

Example : 'put my phone on normal mode/put my phone on silent mode/put my phone on vibrate mode'

Searching on Web

Strings can be searched on web by command starts with 'search on web' phrase.

Example : 'search on web hotels near me'

Get Direction On Map

Direction can be get on Google Map by command starts with 'get directions on map from source to destination' phrase.

Example : 'get direction on map from mumbai to pune'

Searching Videos On Youtube

Strings can be searched on YouTube by command starts with 'search videos for' phrase.

Example : 'search videos for arduino'

Jokes

Jokes can be searched in application by command contains 'jokes' word.

Example : 'tell me some jokes'

News

News can be searched in application by command contains 'news' word.

Example : 'tell me latest news'

Weather

Weather report can be searched in application by command contains 'weather' word.

Example : 'tell me weather report'

Music

Music can be listened by command contains 'music' word.

Example : 'play some music'

Light Control

Lights can be controlled by command contains 'turn on/off' word and control name.

Example : 'turn on light'
